reviewText: I grew up with this series and to see it this clear bring some good memories back. This was a blast!
Title: Robotech: The Masters Saga

reviewText: I had first been exposed to the Robotech Saga back in the eighties, and followed it though later on I became a fan of the Macross series. I wasn't that big a fan of the SDF-1 series, the first series in Robotech, but when I saw the Master's Saga I liked the series more. I've been trying to find the Macross series, Super Dimensional Southern Cavalry, but even on Amazon it's sold out. I settled for the Master's Saga and it hasn't been a disappointment.
Title: Robotech: The Masters Saga

reviewText: Big Robotech fan since I first saw it on Channel 11 here in Washington State. This second series of the Robotech was kinda mystery to me how man kind couldn't knock on the door and ask you new here in the area? But wouldn't that kind on show then! Delivery was on time. Willing to business again with them.
Title: Robotech: The Masters Saga

reviewText: A lackluster space filler in between the 1st and the 3rd Robotech Wars.  Unlike the others which had full stories with many characters and real dimension to them, this one is just all about Dana and how she always is so gung ho for battle and her motley crew of followers.  No real drama and frankly, Dana is just not that likeable.
Title: Robotech: The Masters Saga

reviewText: I like the Robotech sagas, and this generation may not be the best one it is worth having. I now have the full set for my collection.
Title: Robotech: The Masters Saga
